alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Mayes (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 7:45PM CDT until July 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BENTON...DELAWARE AND NORTHEASTERN MAYES COUNTIES... At 745 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles west of Washburn to near Noel to near Jay, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Jay... Bella Vista... Grove... Pea Ridge... Gravette... Langley... Bernice... Spavinaw... Gateway... Disney... Pensacola... Maysville... Honey Creek State Park... Cherokee State Park... Bernice State Park... Spavinaw State Park... Hiwasse... Cleora... Chloeta... Miller... This includes Interstate 49 near mile marker 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
